full_summary:
# Focus Groups for the Evaluation of Employment Insurance (EI) Fishing Benefits

## Tender Number: cb-923-72068777

### Tender Status: Expired

The Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a contractor to conduct 18 virtual focus groups for the evaluation of Employment Insurance (EI) fishing benefits. This tender is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-16TSSB who qualify under Stream 2 Business Consulting/Change Management Services Stream.

## Objectives of the Focus Groups

The main objectives of the focus groups are to:

* Collect the views of focus group participants on the EI fishing benefits in comparison to EI regular benefits
* Understand the effect of EI fishing benefits on participants and their community
* Assess the delivery and service quality of EI fishing benefits

## Contract Requirements

The contractor is required to:

* Conduct 18 virtual focus groups
* Facilitate and analyze the focus groups to meet the objectives outlined above
* Provide a report outlining the results of the focus groups

## Important Dates

* Amendment Date: January 3, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 3, 2024, 14:00:00 hours

## Contact Information

For more information about this tender, please contact:

Sherri Macki
NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000

## Tender Documents

The tender documents can be found at the following URLs:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27078/100024730-npp-english.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27078/100024730-npp-french.pdf

Please note that this tender has expired and is no longer available for submission.  I have formatted the output in markdown format. I was able to condense the original input to fit within the 400-word limit. The rewritten text maintains all the essential details and information, but in a more professional and organized manner.  I have also excluded the unnecessary and redundant information. Let me know if you need me to make any changes!
